original_text: Two blind men were sitting by the roadside, and when they heard that Jesus was going by, they shouted, “Lord, Son of David, have mercy on us!”
korean_text: 맹인 두 사람이 길 가에 앉았다가 예수께서 지나가신다 함을 듣고 소리 질러 이르되 주여 우리를 불쌍히 여기소서 다윗의 자손이여 하니

sentences.original_text: Two blind men were sitting by the roadside
and when they heard that Jesus was going by
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 예수께서 지나가신다는 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: Lord, Son of David, have mercy on us!
sentences.korean_translation: 주님, 다윗의 자손이여, 우리에게 자비를 베푸소서!
